I don't necessarily think she's too strong early game; I think the problem is that, if you look at the past (or if you were present, I don't personally know) anyone considered a lane bully got nerfed. Graves has been nerfed, Corki has been nerfed, Lucian has been nerfed, many bully supports, etc.. Vayne would be just fine if they let lane bullies actually be lane bullies in the bottom lane, but every time they do people complain on the forums that an ADC, a champion who is naturally going to be strong late game, is able to excel in the early game. This has fostered a situation in which people like Vayne, who would hate to be against an actual lane bully, have a safe haven to reach their late-game mostly unchecked. 

I honestly think the problem is less to do with Vayne and more to do with the balance philosophies of the game itself allowing someone like Vayne to have a poor early game be acceptable by way of making everyone who could contest her equally bad because of the scaling nature of the class. This is like if Spectre (DotA2) had her godly late-game and poor early-game combo remain intact, but every lane bully was mostly knocked down to her level because otherwise it's "oppressive."

It's like everyone forgot that the only reason we had Tristana abusing teams in competitive for a year was the fact that Graves, Corki, Draven, Lucian all got nerfed and IE rush became a thing instead of BT.

The cycle is as follows: "My hypercarry is getting abused in lane" -> Nerf lane bullies -> "Why are hypercarries able to make it through lane?" -> Nerf hypercarries -> "All ADCs are too weak" -> Item reworks or item buffs

Rinse, repeat for literally the entirety of League's lifespan.
is LS really short for life steal in league...? How long has that been a thing cause i've been around since season 3 and it took me a few minutes to figure out what you meant hahaha.

Solution to Vayne is increasing the mana cost on her tumble so she can't trade with empowered auto attacks every few seconds and to have condemn stun duration scale with rank. It's way too much to have such a strong AA based champion have such a long stun that also has enormous damage, especially with only 1 point in it. Her farming is among the most reliable in the game thanks to her near instant missile speed and attack animation and this further helps her in the laning phase. 

Her weak early game really doesn't exist. She'll lose an all in until she has a few points in silver bolts if she doesn't condemn you into a wall, otherwise she's by far the strongest ADC.
